layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x118
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x118
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x94
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 280x18
          text run at (0,0) width 280: "The two boxes below should look identical."
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,34) size 214x60
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 214x60
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 214x56
